steps: 1. Get your BuffSend MCP API key from https://www.buffsend.com/account/api-keys
2. Replace 'YOUR_API_KEY_HERE' with your actual API key
3. Save this file to the location above for your operating system
5. Test by asking: 'Check my BuffSend account status'
cursor_specific_notes: Make sure to enable MCP in Cursor settings
You can also configure this through Cursor's settings UI
